info: The second booster pack series released for Gundam M.S War was based on the movie for Gundam Wing titled 'Endless Waltz'. This included all the Gundams in their custom variations as well as the pilots in their movie outfit variations. There was no starter deck for this series. The booster packs had the name 'Gundam M.S. War Gundam-W Endless Waltz' instead of 'Gundam M.S War'. The booster pack also states both factions 'OZ Corp / Wing Gundam Team' on the front.

cards.name: X-18999
cards.battle_scars: Opponent draws 3 cards from Supply Base.

effect.text: Each time you pay 5 or more Prices during the Strategic Phase, you may place one OZ M.S. card without paying its Price during your next Preliminary Phase.

cards.name: L1 Colony
cards.battle_scars: Destroy a Pilot card of your opponent's choice.

effect.text: Return a WG Pilot card of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand at the beginning of each turn.
Increase all Serpent M.S. cards' Clash Points by 2. They also add Preemptive Strike.

cards.name: The Gundam Scrap Heap
cards.battle_scars: Hold one card and discard the rest of your hand.

effect.text: Return a WG M.S. card of your choice from the Dry Dock to your hand at the beginning of each turn.

cards.name: In the Atmosphere
cards.battle_scars: Destroy a M.S. card of opponent's choice

effect.text: All Atacking or Defending players receive 3 Battle Damages to each Supply Base.

cards.name: In the Satellite's Orbit
cards.battle_scars: Return a M.S. card from the M.S. Dock to the bottom of Supply Base.

effect.text: All Attacking WG M.S. cards add Preemptive Strike.

cards.name: Mariemaia Army Headquarters
cards.battle_scars: Send all Pilot cards in play to the Defunct Pile.

effect.text: Destroy an unattacked Pilot card placed on M.S. Dock when Attacking M.S. cards are not Defended.
Reduce Battle Damages to your Supply Base by 2.
